artist: Painter: After Francesco Mazzola (Il Parmigianino); Engraver: Conrad Martin Metz
description: two images printed on one sheet; left soldier facing pillar of fire; right group of figures both women and men standing; printed in brown
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

below image in brown: PARMEGIANO/ In the Collection of His Majesty/ Published as the Act directs  Aug. 4, 1789 by C.M. Metz | in pencil: 2-40
portfolio: From Imitations of Ancient and Modern Drawings
title: Parmegiano
